author: Ernst
title: Chima Comic with minifigure Crug
review:
These comic-books are also available in the Netherlands. A good deal if your kid likes Chima and also for other collectors.

Overall 4 bricks : A fun comic book with a minifigure is a good deal, also for collectors if the book survives the kid.

Building 1 brick : Assembling a minifigure can't be called building.

Parts 3 bricks : A complete minifigure with weapon.

Playability 4 bricks : Standing alone not much fun of course but you can add it to all other Chima sets.

Value 5 bricks : For the price of €4,00 you get fun book for kids, which you can also collect and a good minifigure so a nice deal. We try to get every new one from now.
